episode_event_general_specialcos02/6701_: I’m sure of it this time! I heard it from Trista!

I got up early so I could dress up for today’s
tea party and have time to spare in case I
got lost, but...

It looks like I might be running late anyway...
Things just aren’t going as planned.
Did it take a while to get ready?
Yes. I really worked hard on my look for today!

I’ve been looking forward to attending the tea
party dressed up the same as Polteageist!
Oh! But this is no time to stand around chatting!

I don’t want to make everyone wait for us! Come
on, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! Let’s hurry!
episode_event_general_specialcos02/6702_: Whew! We made it just in time!

It looks like everyone’s here. I think the party’s
about to start!

Welcome, everyone! Welcome to our curious
tea party!
Ohohohohohoooh!
S-Sonia?! You seem kinda different...
And what do you mean by “curious”?

The tea party Lear is throwing today is no
ordinary one!

It is open only to sync pairs who have worked
together with Pokémon to solve the riddles and
puzzles we’ve prepared!
We shall be conducting today’s event.

Allow us to transport you all to a dazzling world
of curious conundrums!

I’m afraid there’ll be no exit available once we’ve
begun! The puzzles awaiting you are difficult ones,
so prepare yourselves!
Ohohohohohoooh!

Sonia sure seems to be having fun! She’s really
getting into this!

As for puzzles... I’m not really confident about
solving them.

But maybe I can make use of the experiences I
had back in Alola!

And besides, I’m sure I’ll be fine because I’ve got
you with me, right, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
You can count on me!

I’m glad to hear it! I’ll be giving it my all as well
so we can reach our goal!
Let’s work it all out together!

Yes! With the right attitude, I know we can reach
our goal together!
episode_event_general_specialcos02/6801_:
Let’s go to a tea party
with Polteageist!

Let’s go to the tea party as soon as you’re
ready, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!

I’ll be waiting there for you. But remember—it’s
no ordinary tea party!
No ordinary tea party? What do you mean?

You’ll find out when you get there!
Ohohohohohoooh!
episode_event_general_specialcos02/6802_:
Are you fully prepared for the tea
party, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?

As both your Subway Bosses and butlers, we’ll be
serving up quite the treat!

You can look forward to safe driving and a
thrilling event!

Please allow plenty of time so you won’t have to
rush to your seat!
